alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:39PM EDT until June 16 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Moore County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Montgomery County in central North Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 539 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Biscoe, or 12 miles east of Troy, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Biscoe, Robbins, Star, Candor, Steeds, Highfalls, Eagle Springs and Seven Lakes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
